data.title: Simplify & Unite Networking and Security
data.meta_description: Infoblox delivers the network protection you need & the performance that is demanded. Build for a world that never stops.

Performance and protection in action

Learn more about our customers

Stabilizing and securing networks across continents

With a globe-spanning footprint of medical device manufacturing facilities and workforces, HARTMANN lacked visibility and uniformity across its complex networks. Complete, state-of-the-art DDI and DNS solutions from Infoblox resulted in a new comprehensive overview of IT infrastructure and reduced overhead to match.

Learn More

Delivering a pandemic win with core network services

The Rangers’ 2020 move to its new stadium was complicated by COVID-19 slowdowns, including in public IT infrastructure provisioning. Infoblox integrated and automated rock-solid DDI and Advanced DNS Protection, upgrading from legacy systems and deploying new enterprise-grade infrastructure in time for opening day.

Learn More

Enabling high-speed broadband in rural USA

WAVE was created to meet a critical need: bringing high-speed home broadband connectivity to rural customers across AK and OK. Infoblox designed and deployed a high-availability (HA) MPLS architecture and outfitted WAVE with high-performing NIOS DDI. And for its first two years, WAVE’s customers had zero service disruptions.

Learn More

Measurably increasing productivity through new DDI automations

When Adobe (a company with more than 1,100 external domains) met Infoblox, it was running a legacy system prone to patching-related outages. The solution was Infoblox DDI, with patented Infoblox Grid™ architecture, central management, a shared data repository and integrated software. The solution drove reliability while reducing staff burden.

Learn More

Achieving 100% service uptime across 43 departments

AAFC faced disjointed systems and management silos across its 80 locations, resulting in network issues, upgrading difficulties and unnecessary administrative overhead. They selected Infoblox’s 1050 appliances with Trinzic with Grid™, and their essential DNS and DHCP network services worked around the clock. Now, maintenance is minimal.

Learn More

Smoothing operations through simplified network management

Munich’s remarkable airport complex—housing everything from shopping to medical facilities to its own fire department—comes with the IT requirements of a small city. The airport chose Infoblox solutions that combine DNS, DHCP and DDI in one platform, making it simple and easy to maintain complete control over the entire network.

Learn More

Going on offense with an integrated security ecosystem

Aflac needed to migrate to the cloud–and security solutions that could scale easily, ensure coverage for its global workforce and enable centralized network management. They chose Infoblox’s BloxOne® Threat Defense Advanced solution, optimizing performance of their entire cybersecurity ecosystem to proactively defeat threats while reducing costs.

Learn More

Get to know our

products

Manage from the cloud with BloxOne® DDI or on prem with NIOS DDI.

DNS DETECTION & RESPONSE

Deploy hybrid DNS-layer security with BloxOne® Threat Defense.

CLOUD NETWORK AUTOMATION

Manage Hybrid Workloads

Maintain complex multi-cloud networks with automated processes.

THREAT INTELLIGENCE

Protect Against Evolving Threats

Uplift security stacks with DNS threat intel that’s huntedhunted, not gathered.
